name: Poak & Lampu
description:
You play as Poak. You have to find a girl named Lampu. 

She suddenly disappeared but it's very cold outside so you better find her back quickly. Keep in mind that it's winter so try not to freeze. Luckily there are fires to keep you warm. If you freeze to death you will respawn at the previous fire.

Use the mouse to look around.

Use ZQSD to move. 

(if u have QWERTY: press ALT+SHIFT to change to WASD)

This game was made for the Sykoo's Community Game Jam.
